net.kuujo.vertigo.io.connection

Interface OutputConnectionContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConnectionContext<OutputConnectionContext>, Context<OutputConnectionContext>, JsonSerializable, Observable<OutputConnectionContext>

    public interface OutputConnectionContext
extends ConnectionContext<OutputConnectionContext>
    Output connection context represents a single instance's output to an instance of another component.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
